summary: Paul is a flayed alive teenager who has a gay affair with Philippe.
cast: Philippe March|Jean-Claude Dauphin|Nathalie Fontaine|Yann Favre|Dany Roussel|Claude Larcher|Hélène Zanicolli|Christian Chevreuse|Martin Pierlot|Liliane Valais|Vincent Gauthier|Sylvie Delanoë|Jean-Claude Holzen|Dominique Oudard
title: Les amis
